short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Making the internet a million times better by replacing all images on a page with gifs of Nigel Thornberry.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A simple extension that with the click of a button replaces all images on the current page with gifs of Nigel Thornberry. Intended to make your browsing experience one million times better.
